attributes.action: Deport all first-generation immigrants if they do not gain employment within six months of entering the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a whole, are a hard working country, who pay our taxes, make national insurance contributions, and are generally law abiding. However, we believe that tax money that we pay should not be wasted on immigrants who come into the United Kingdom just to claim Jobseeker's allowance, Child Benifits, and Disability benefits, amongst other things, as this is dreadfully unfair and a poor reflection on the hard working folk of this country, thus bringing them into disrepute.
